## Checklist

<!-- Mark all items that apply. This helps maintain scientific integrity and reproducibility. -->

- [ ] Code / notebooks follow the repository structure and naming conventions
- [ ] Any new dataset includes source info and validation notes
- [ ] Documentation updated (README, methodology notes, dataset logs, etc.)
- [ ] No sensitive or proprietary data included
- [ ] Reproducibility verified on a clean environment
- [ ] Metadata (e.g., CRS, units, measurement assumptions) correctly documented
